none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on June 28, 2019 Description from Terminal Escape:
New York City punks doing it right - OUTSKIRTS' 2016 demo deposits a scant ten minutes of earnest hardcore and then leaves you to contemplate. No flavor of the month bounce, no artificially tweaked anything, no pandering. Yes breakdowns, yes intensity, yes power, yes honesty. There's a full length recording that dropped earlier this year....highly recommended. OUTSKIRTS say you'll be here but you can't handle tears say you'll be there but you don't believe in strength think once it's done, it's done - don't see how it goes on and on can't stand to see you powerful
https://outskirtsnyc.bandcamp.com/album/outskirts

seo.title: Outskirts - Outskirts demo 2016 - Terminal Escape
